name: Medic Mayhem
description:
Medic Mayhem is a 2D survival game where you must dodge various projectiles in order to achieve as high a score as possible. This game is designed entirely by me which you could probably tell by its poor drawings. I also created custom SFX, but mainly used sounds from online. This is also my first time rigging and animating my own character. This project deepened Unity concepts and helped me advance my game development journey. 

Credits: 

Main theme - Theo JT

SFX - FreeSound.org users
